actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend subchapter III of chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, relating to civil service retirement.

summary.text: Permits Federal employees of the civil service to retire with an annuity after twenty years of service. Provides for an annuity of a multiple of 2 1/2 percent of his average pay times his years of total service. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8336, 8339)

titles.title: A bill to amend subchapter III of chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, relating to civil service retirement.
